sections.content: Doing is not the same as understanding. STUDENT requires you to prove you've absorbed the concepts, not just clicked through them. This is the difference between activity and learning.

Complete a quiz for any previous achievement. By passing, you demonstrate that the knowledge has been internalized. This meta-learning - learning how to learn DeFi - is the most valuable skill of all.

content: Quizzes verify comprehension, not just completion
This achievement unlocks when you pass any chapter quiz
Learning compounds - early concepts enable advanced ones

questions.question: Why is verified learning important in DeFi?
options: To ensure users understand before acting
